prompt_base: photograph of a slender alien, smooth silver and purple skin, large luminous yellow bug-like eyes, radio antenna on head, futuristic aesthetic, determined expression, 8k cinematic photo
feature_prompt: high gloss texture on silver armor, detailed lens texture on eyes, visible seams on armor, subtle organic texture on purple skin, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, human eyes, flat color, low quality, blurry antennae, (human face:1.3), messy, dull
